ComicInfo.Title: Hyperbreed Part 1: Countdown
ComicInfo.Series: John Carpenter Presents Storm Kids: Hyperbreed
ComicInfo.Summary: Byrr, Fext and Cammo: Hyperbreed human-animal 'splices' who've been given a cushy assignment, board an ancient freighter, transport valuable Explosive Ore to a mining colony, and earn a large delivery bonus. But when they drop out of spacefold, Mak pirates--robot monsters wearing the body parts of vanquished enemies--attack. Fighting against cruel odds, with Mak Yik crystals infesting their ship, our heroes begin to suspect that their lucky break is really a setup for annihilation.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-22 18:36:59. [CVDB770278] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 10:26:39. [Issue ID 2567140]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Guy Dorian Sr.,Guy Dorian,Guy Dorian Sr.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Young Adult, Suggested Ages 12 and Older
